attributes.action: arrange for police complaints to be completely dealt with outside of police influence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Anyone who has recently made a complaint against the police knows that in spite of the introduction of the Independent Police Complaints Commission most police complaints are still completely dealt with by the police.  Also the investigators are normally from the same force as the officers who are the subjects of the complaint. This is unacceptable, and we wish for a truly independent complaints system.
